title: Asu wo Tsukutta Otoko: Tanabe Sakurou to Biwako Sosui
title_english: The Man Who Has Changed the History: A Drannage of Lake Biwa
title_japanese: 明日をつくった男 ~田辺朔郎と琵琶湖疏水~
title_synonyms: The Man Who Has Changed the History: A Drainage of Lake Biwa
synopsis: A fusion of live action and animation to tell the story of Lake Biwa's draining. Lake Biwa Canal has been an economic life giver to Kyoto. Its formation is all due to a young engineer by the name Tanabe Sakuro who tried to incorporate an idealistic and new technology of the time: hydroelectric power. He was able to build Japan's first hydro-electric power station through the construction of the canal (which obviously required the lake the be drained, hence the title of the anime).
